sentences.en: The book is expected to dominate the best-seller lists.
sentences.cn: 这本书预期将占据畅销书榜首的位置。

sentences.en: He had the satisfaction of seeing his book become a best-seller.
sentences.cn: 看到自己的作品成了畅销书，他志得意满。

sentences.en: His eighth book came out earlier this year and was an instant best-seller.
sentences.cn: 他的第8本书今年早些时候出版了，并很快成为了一本畅销书。
